title: How to Make Cabbage With Caraway Seed

steps.headline: Wash and dry the cabbage if needed.
steps.description: Remove outer leaves that are not suitable for eating owing to blemishes, etc.

steps.headline: Add the salt to the boiling water and the marjoram.
Pop in the shredded cabbage.
steps.description: Cover the saucepan and cook quickly. Allow the steam to escape during cooking by lifting off the lid periodically.

steps.headline: Once tender, remove the cabbage by draining.
Place the cabbage into the serving dish.
steps.description: Add the butter or margarine and sprinkle the caraway seeds over the top. Serve immediately.

text: Wash and dry the cabbage if needed. Remove outer leaves that are not suitable for eating owing to blemishes, etc. Shred the cabbage.  Fill a saucepan with 1cm/1/2" water. Bring this to the boil. Add the salt to the boiling water and the marjoram.  Pop in the shredded cabbage. Cover the saucepan and cook quickly. Allow the steam to escape during cooking by lifting off the lid periodically. Once tender, remove the cabbage by draining.  Place the cabbage into the serving dish. Add the butter or margarine and sprinkle the caraway seeds over the top. Serve immediately.
